alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lafourche; Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 3:01PM CDT until June 20 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lafourche Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southeastern Jefferson Parish in southeastern Louisiana... West central Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 301 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lafitte to near Port Sulphur, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Port Sulphur, Myrtle Grove, Pointe A La Hache, Empire and Buras-triumph. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
